attributes.name: Simple Custom Reports for Jira
attributes.description:
A powerful tool that allows you to create custom reports and gadgets for your team's kanban, scrum, or any other project management methodology with minimal configuration. With this app, you can instantly generate insightful and easy-to-use reports that give you a bird's eye view of your team's performance and progress, helping you make informed decisions and stay on top of your projects.

Our app is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, allowing you to quickly and easily configure the data you want to display and choose from a variety of chart types, including bar charts, pie charts, and line graphs. You can also customize the look and feel of your reports with a range of visual themes, making it easy to match your company's branding and style.

Whether you're a project manager, team lead, or team member, our app for Jira is the perfect tool to help you stay organized, track progress, and drive results. Try it today and see how easy it is to get the insights you need to make your team more productive and successful.

attributes.name: Ampliz Healthcare Intelligence
attributes.description: Ampliz, the leading healthcare data provider, fulfills the data needs of Medical Device Manufacturing Companies, Pharmaceutical Companies, Healthcare Recruitment Firms, Medical Representatives, Diagnostic Centers, and all other healthcare-related subsidiaries.
attributes.detail_description:
A top-notch healthcare data provider sought after by industries and professionals to boom their businesses in the core regions of the United States. 

Why Ampliz Healthcare?
The healthcare data curated by Ampliz provides instant access to high-quality target-specific, intent-based, and customized healthcare intelligence derived from real-time purchase footprints and advanced data mining techniques. 
Grow your business efficiently and effortlessly with proven, high-end intelligence on top healthcare center databases, technical and financial profiles of hospitals, clinical accounts, and verified leads on physicians and key medical personnel, including C-level contacts. 

Who is Ampliz Healthcare Intelligence for?
Ampliz, the leading healthcare data provider, fulfills the data needs of Medical Device Manufacturing Companies, Pharmaceutical Companies, Healthcare Recruitment Firms, Medical Representatives, Diagnostic Centers, and all other healthcare-related subsidiaries. 
Ampliz connected 5000+ businesses including Microsoft, Autodesk, AvePoint, CNBC, and GE Healthcare to their buyers. Get a hold of the 2 Million+ accurate, well-segmented, comprehensive Ampliz healthcare database to draw an impact on your business in the US market.

attributes.name: Keeper
attributes.description:
Keeper is an all-in-one app to streamline bookkeeping and client accounting services.
 

 Keeper sync directly to your client's QuickBooks file. This powers your custom-branded Client Portal, file reviews, management reporting, and workflow management.
 

 Stay on top of your work, get faster responses from your clients, and deliver reports they'll actually read. Try Keeper for free for 14 days, or schedule a customized demo to learn more.

attributes.name: EWCart
attributes.description: EWCart is the ideal eCommerce platform for you, offering you what you need for your business, plus your very own team of web developers to build and manage your site at no extra cost.
attributes.detail_description:
Start, run, and grow your business with us. EWCart is the ideal eCommerce platform for you, offering you what you need for your business, plus your very own team of web developers to build and manage your site at no extra cost.

Get a professionally developed eCommerce website – for free. EWCart gives you the tools you need to make your business a success, without any hidden costs. We understand the struggles of small businesses, so we strive to help all our customers avoid them. With just $29 in maintenance fees and a free, full-customizable website setup, you can start building your business today. Add to that your own dedicated in-house development team at no extra charge and you have a recipe for success.

You choose us but we find you because sellers like you are the reason for our existence. We eliminate the need for hiring a programmer even after paying the fees of an eCommerce platform. With us, everything comes in a single package and at a very affordable price.

attributes.name: Shopify Multi Carrier Shipping Label
attributes.description:

 The app allows you to calculate and display live shipping rates at Shopify checkout, print 100s of shipping labels in a single click and also automate the tracking process by sending live tracking email notifications to your customers.

With MyHub, benefit from modern intranet features such as pre-built templates, chat, newsfeeds, forums, blogs, calendars, document storage, automated forms, social network, staff directories, alerts and notifications.

When you need to ensure your team have the information they need, MyHub will get you there quickly.

attributes.name: BackHQ
attributes.description: Back Technologies is a software company from Berlin building Back, the employee request platform that will let you focus on what matters again. Not your average help desk.
attributes.detail_description:
Back is the first employee service platform for internal service teams to organize and automate all workplace requests and processes on one intuitive platform. 	
		
It provides employees with a convenient way to get help and information and always know who is taking care of their question. The platform integrates with various communication channels (including Slack and email), so employees can submit requests the way they are used to.

Back centralizes all requests in one easy-to-use platform and helps internal service teams respond to them using approvals, forms, reports and integrations. Back automatically answers recurring requests and tasks that do not require the experts’ involvement, saving the experts valuable time. 

Back provides full transparency to managers by tracking the time their teams spend on resolving requests and helping you proactively identify trends to improve internal workflows.

attributes.name: Synthace
attributes.description: Synthace is a digital experiment platform built for high-performance life science R&D teams to help them run more powerful experiments and accelerate scientific progress. It allows biologists to design, plan, and automate experiments in a single place, then automatically gather structured experiment data and metadata in a unified no-code environment.
attributes.detail_description:
Synthace is a digital experiment platform built for life science R&D teams to help them get faster, more valuable insights by running more powerful, insightful, and reproducible experiments. 

It digitizes experiments from end to end: with minimal training, scientists can design and plan reproducible experiments, simulate them ahead of time, run them on their automation equipment or execute them manually, and automatically structure and combine all of their experimental data and metadata in a single place. 

Controlled from a browser window and needing no code to operate, it makes experiments easier to run in the lab, increases the scientific value of experiments, and makes it possible to run experiments previously thought impossible.

With offices in London, Boston, and San Diego, Synthace helps dozens of life science organizations conduct radically better biology.
